title: The Spirit of the Lord Revealed

verses.text: The Spirit of the Lord revealed His will to saints of old; Their heart and mind and lips unsealed His glory to unfold.
The prophets passed; at length there came To sojourn and abide, The Word incarnate, to whose name The prophets testified;
Eternal Spirit, who dost speak To mind and conscience still, That we in this our day, may seek To do our Father's will,

refrain.text: Amid the gloom of ancient night They hailed the dawning Word, And He, the twilight over past, Him-self, the Light of way; To us the word of life impart, Or Christ, the living way; And in the coming of the light Proclaimed the coming Lord. As man with man, revealed at last The Father to obey. Give us the quiet, humble heart To hear and to obey.
